description.sun-moon:
The user slams into the target with the force of a
meteor. This move can be used on the target 
regardless of its Abilities.

meteor. This move can be used on the target 
regardless of its Abilities.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Other Pokémon's abilities cannot activate in response to this move.  In particular, it hits through disguise
